mapper.select: /* USE : RtnStatusDayMapper.getPayColAddList */ SELECT PAY_CD, PAY_NM, PAY_METHOD FROM ( SELECT tcn.NMCODE_CD AS PAY_CD, tcn.NMCODE_NM AS PAY_NM, tcn.NMCODE_ITEM_1 AS PAY_METHOD FROM TB_CM_NMCODE tcn WHERE tcn.NMCODE_GRP_CD = '024' AND tcn.NMCODE_CD NOT IN ('05', '12') /* 쿠폰은 결제수단이 아닌 할인내역으로 들어가므로 하드코딩으로 결제수단에 나오지 않도록 함. */ ORDER BY tcn.NMCODE_CD ) UNION ALL ( SELECT '021' AS PAY_CD, '현금영수증' AS PAY_NM, 'CASH_BILL' AS PAY_METHOD FROM dual ) ORDER BY PAY_CD

/* USE : DayMapper.getDcColList */
SELECT tcn.NMCODE_CD AS DC_CD, tcn.NMCODE_NM AS DC_NM, tcn.NMCODE_ITEM_1 AS DC_METHOD FROM TB_CM_NMCODE tcn WHERE tcn.NMCODE_GRP_CD = '041' ORDER BY tcn.NMCODE_CD

/* USE : RtnStatusDayMapper.getRtnstatusBillList */
SELECT tssh.STORE_CD , tms.STORE_NM , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(tssh.SALE_DATE, 'yyyymmdd'), 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS SALE_DATE , tssh.POS_NO , tssh.BILL_NO , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(tssh.ORG_SALE_DATE, 'yyyymmdd'), 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS ORG_SALE_DATE , tssh.ORG_POS_NO , tssh.ORG_BILL_NO , tssh.TOT_SALE_AMT , tssh.TOT_DC_AMT , tssh.REAL_SALE_AMT , (tssh.REAL_SALE_AMT - tssh.VAT_AMT) AS GA_AMT , tssh.VAT_AMT , tssh.TOT_TIP_AMT , tssh.TOT_ETC_AMT
, NVL(tsshp.PAY${item}, 0) + NVL(tsspc.PAY02, 0) + NVL(tsspc.PAY021, 0) AS TOT_PAY_AMT , tsshp.PAY${item} AS PAY${item}
, tsspc.PAY02 AS PAY02 -- 현금 , tsspc.PAY021 AS PAY021 -- 현금영수증
FROM ( SELECT tssh.STORE_CD , tssh.SALE_DATE , tssh.POS_NO , tssh.BILL_NO , tssh.ORG_SALE_DATE , tssh.ORG_POS_NO , tssh.ORG_BILL_NO , tssh.TOT_SALE_AMT , tssh.TOT_DC_AMT , tssh.REAL_SALE_AMT , (tssh.REAL_SALE_AMT - tssh.VAT_AMT) AS GA_AMT , tssh.VAT_AMT , tssh.TOT_TIP_AMT , tssh.TOT_ETC_AMT FROM ( SELECT tssh.STORE_CD , tssh.SALE_DATE , tssh.POS_NO , tssh.BILL_NO , SUBSTR(tssh.ORG_BILL_NO,-14,8) AS ORG_SALE_DATE , SUBSTR(tssh.ORG_BILL_NO,-6,2) AS ORG_POS_NO , SUBSTR(tssh.ORG_BILL_NO,-4) AS ORG_BILL_NO , tssh.TOT_SALE_AMT , tssh.TOT_DC_AMT , tssh.REAL_SALE_AMT , (tssh.REAL_SALE_AMT - tssh.VAT_AMT) AS GA_AMT , tssh.VAT_AMT , tssh.TOT_TIP_AMT , tssh.TOT_ETC_AMT FROM TB_SL_SALE_HDR tssh WHERE tssh.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND tssh.SALE_YN = 'N'
AND tssh.STORE_CD IN
#{item}
AND ( 'N' = (SELECT NVL(MAX(ENVST_VAL), 'N') FROM TB_HQ_ENVST WHERE HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND ENVST_CD = '0001') OR tssh.STORE_CD IN (SELECT STORE_CD FROM TB_HQ_EMPLOYEE_STORE_V08 WHERE HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND EMP_NO = #{empNo}) )
AND tssh.SALE_DATE BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} ) tssh ) tssh , ( SELECT STORE_CD, SALE_DATE, POS_NO, BILL_NO
, SUM(PAY${item}) AS PAY${item}
FROM ( SELECT tsshp.STORE_CD, tsshp.SALE_DATE, tsshp.POS_NO, tsshp.BILL_NO, tsshp.PAY_CD, tsshp.PAY_AMT FROM TB_SL_SALE_HDR_PAY tsshp WHERE tsshp.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND tsshp.SALE_YN = 'N'
AND tsshp.STORE_CD IN
#{item}
AND ( 'N' = (SELECT NVL(MAX(ENVST_VAL), 'N') FROM TB_HQ_ENVST WHERE HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND ENVST_CD = '0001') OR tsshp.STORE_CD IN (SELECT STORE_CD FROM TB_HQ_EMPLOYEE_STORE_V08 WHERE HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND EMP_NO = #{empNo}) )
AND tsshp.SALE_DATE BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} AND tsshp.PAY_CD != '02' -- 현금,현금영수증 분리
AND tsshp.SALE_DATE BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} ) PIVOT ( SUM(PAY_AMT) FOR PAY_CD IN (${pivotPayCol}) ) GROUP BY STORE_CD, SALE_DATE, POS_NO, BILL_NO ) tsshp , ( SELECT tsspc.STORE_CD, tsspc.SALE_DATE, tsspc.POS_NO, tsspc.BILL_NO, CASE WHEN SUM(tsspc.SALE_AMT) - SUM(CASE WHEN tsspc.APPR_PROC_FG IN ('1','2','4') THEN tsspc.SALE_AMT ELSE NULL END) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(tsspc.SALE_AMT) - SUM(CASE WHEN tsspc.APPR_PROC_FG IN ('1','2','4') THEN tsspc.SALE_AMT ELSE NULL END) END AS PAY02, -- 현금 SUM(CASE WHEN tsspc.APPR_PROC_FG IN ('1','2','4') THEN tsspc.SALE_AMT ELSE NULL END) AS PAY021 -- 현금영수증 FROM TB_SL_SALE_PAY_CASH tsspc WHERE tsspc.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND tsspc.SALE_YN = 'N'
AND tsspc.STORE_CD IN
#{item}
AND ( 'N' = (SELECT NVL(MAX(ENVST_VAL), 'N') FROM TB_HQ_ENVST WHERE HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND ENVST_CD = '0001') OR tsspc.STORE_CD IN (SELECT STORE_CD FROM TB_HQ_EMPLOYEE_STORE_V08 WHERE HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND EMP_NO = #{empNo}) )
AND tsspc.SALE_DATE BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} GROUP BY tsspc.STORE_CD, tsspc.SALE_DATE, tsspc.POS_NO, tsspc.BILL_NO ) tsspc , TB_MS_STORE tms WHERE tsshp.STORE_CD(+) = tssh.STORE_CD AND tsshp.SALE_DATE(+) = tssh.SALE_DATE AND tsshp.POS_NO(+) = tssh.POS_NO AND tsshp.BILL_NO(+) = tssh.BILL_NO AND tms.STORE_CD = tssh.STORE_CD AND tsspc.STORE_CD(+) = tssh.STORE_CD AND tsspc.SALE_DATE(+) = tssh.SALE_DATE AND tsspc.POS_NO(+) = tssh.POS_NO AND tsspc.BILL_NO(+) = tssh.BILL_NO AND tms.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd}
-- 당일매출제외 AND tssh.SALE_DATE != tssh.ORG_SALE_DATE
-- 현금 AND PAY02 IS NOT NULL
-- 현금영수증 AND PAY021 IS NOT NULL
AND PAY${item} IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY tssh.STORE_CD, tssh.SALE_DATE, tssh.POS_NO, tssh.BILL_NO DESC
